stories.title: The Blockchain in a Historical Perspective

stories.text:
Hello HN, I cannot find this interesting article about system thinking/theory I read. I'm pretty sure I had found it on hacker news.

What I remember is that it made the example of a village as a system, and the max population the village could reach by foraging in a certain area. Searching systems thinking/theory on algolia didn't help. If you help me finding it back I would be very grateful.
stories.title: Ask HN: Can you help me find an intersting article about system thinking
The Nuclear Accidents at Chalk River

stories.text:
Using a single ultra widescreen or multiple 16:9 or any other ratio monitors is now common even in office spaces must people are using at least two screens.

I wonder what is the setup for different HN readers. Being in software engineering or any other line of business. Some information that can probably be helpful for future searchers and readers:

- How many screens do you have? - What is aspect ratio of each screen? - What is your primary use of the setup?

As description please feel free to add your best practices, routines, etc. on how you maximise the usage.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you use your (ultra/wide) monitor/s?
One Vulnerable Jenkins Server, That's All They Need
